mapper.select: SELECT f.logo_file_path, f.`name`, f.description, f.website_url,f.created_at FROM factories f WHERE f.types = 1 and f.`status`=5 ORDER BY f.created_at DESC limit 0,12

SELECT g.id as id,gp.id as pgid, g.title,g.second_title,g.retail_price, gp.url_path FROM goods g LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,url_path,good_id FROM goods_pictures ) AS gp ON g.id = gp.good_id where g.`status`=5 and g.is_published = 1 and g.is_recommend=1 group BY id ORDER BY id DESC ,pgid asc limit 0,6
SELECT c.`name`, c.id FROM cities c WHERE c.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY c.sort_index
SELECT c.`name`, c.id FROM cities c WHERE c.parent_id = #{param1} ORDER BY c.sort_index
SELECT c.`name` AS pname, c.id AS pid, cc.`name` AS cname, cc.id AS cid FROM cities c LEFT JOIN cities cc ON cc.parent_id = c.id WHERE c.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY c.sort_index

SELECT id, types, versions, down_url FROM app_versions
WHERE types = #{types}
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET phone = #{phone}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{customer_id}
